name: Furmidable Mystery
description:
Catthew knew the night would be somber as it was the reading of his grandfathers’ will. But at family dinner at the estate, things take a sour turn when suddenly the lights go out and back on again, only to reveal his girlfriend has been murdered! Catthew, now heartbroken, must begin the interrogation of everyone who was there that night.  No one will leave until the case is solved and the murderer is brought to justice! But the questions remain.... who did it? And why?

WASD to move Catthew
E to talk to the closest cat or item when not in combat
R to attack/pounce enemies
Left shift to run
Space to jump
Click with mouse to select dialogue and menu options
